module.name: babbling
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: A module to issue pseudo random (sinusoids) commands to the iCub (either several joints, or individual joints)

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
To specify whether a single joint should be used for babbling. If >=0, the indicated joint will be used. If -1, multiple joints will be used.
Where should the head be pointed during babbling
Start joint configuration for arm when doing the babbling

input.description: Response port. Supported commands: - help - quit - babbling arm left/right [duration] - babbling hand left/right - babbling joint joint_number left/right [duration]
